Two friends shared a prime when creating RSA keys. Their encrypted secrets got mixed up: can you recover the message from 819725935463913497996139099521870177171134393996637730378054554752964248727078848205285007096110281766209130546985187648229499249358673976760150424358594425020039504824418657659033151404718674055329321514675368651553362499887593838?

The flag format is flag{...}
n=898026875902573092798705404767533152698250402863156640880701070028516392610717451381106966621634333234359339109851910861354400737109099406158773215772661554824710403595040675132712397449534120967421748334850215200224733486730890233, n2=527026111113408871409625054088144922323291996463235074754459387228774307468195895326605692012933096963983221051128836621608535605966102893278735973670717641344740342175853198833054545659144091043095463679227569996961201891127013673, e=230030802395656527452240981437233220732332582969474654514726598696208458954901502751194444038333236547573642043816769048141002289547487720454368513363945842088632427902609567252601924832160419824498707739150065694641882892872079211

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{l0o7v09b}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 819725935463913497996139099521870177171134393996637730378054554752964248727078848205285007096110281766209130546985187648229499249358673976760150424358594425020039504824418657659033151404718674055329321514675368651553362499887593838
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=898026875902573092798705404767533152698250402863156640880701070028516392610717451381106966621634333234359339109851910861354400737109099406158773215772661554824710403595040675132712397449534120967421748334850215200224733486730890233, n2=527026111113408871409625054088144922323291996463235074754459387228774307468195895326605692012933096963983221051128836621608535605966102893278735973670717641344740342175853198833054545659144091043095463679227569996961201891127013673, e=230030802395656527452240981437233220732332582969474654514726598696208458954901502751194444038333236547573642043816769048141002289547487720454368513363945842088632427902609567252601924832160419824498707739150065694641882892872079211
